self.description: A link to the current resource

postcode.description: The Client's post code. Required if service is HMRC-MTD-IT.

vatRegDate.description: The Client's VAT registration date. Required if service is HMRC-MTD-VAT.

arn.description: The Agent Registration Number for the calling agency

created.description: Creation time of the request (RFC3339 / ISO8601 format)

lastUpdated.description: Last update time of the request (RFC3339 / ISO8601 format)

status.description: The current status of the invitation

oneOf.description: The invitation has been created, it has not been accepted or rejected by the client. Only the service can set this status.
The client has accepted the invitation. Only the client can set this status.
The client has rejected the invitation. Only the client can set this status.
The agency has cancelled the invitation. Only the agency can set this status.
The invitation already expired. Only the service can set this status.
